blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary:
Consider:
It’s the end of Captain Marvel. Carol Danvers has just saved the world from the shapeshifting monsters. She flies...
body: Consider: It’s the end of Captain Marvel. Carol Danvers has just saved the world from the shapeshifting monsters. She flies over a city and everyone cheers! The camera points toward the crowd and then cuts into the crowd next to a little brown girl. She’s wearing what appears to be hastily made Captain Marvel cosplay, which is just a blue shirt with a felt lighting symbol superglued onto it. She’s not cheering, she just stares in awe. Her mom takes her hand to get her away from the crowd. “C’mon, Kamala, lets go.” But her voice sounds distant. The credits roll.

summary: I hope Captain Marvel does big numbers because it does seem like Brie Larson has been floundering a bit since Room.
title: I hope Captain Marvel does big numbers because it does seem like Brie Larson has been floundering a bit since Room.
body:
The problem is:

Like, she’s young and attractive and talented and has an Oscar.

But she isn’t your typical sex bomb either. And maybe hasn’t picked the best scripts. 

It seems like Hollywood execs have just been wondering what to do with her.

blog.name: third-law-of-thermodynamics
blog.title: This just in...
blog.description: This is me and what I enjoy, or not as the case may be...

summary: I think I'm going to see Captain Marvel on the opening weekend
body:
I think I’m going to see Captain Marvel on the opening weekend

I’m always a bit reluctant, I’m in my 40’s and I’ve no one to go with, I don’t know, guess I’m afraid of coming across as a bit odd. I tend to wait until couple of weeks before I see a movie, usually less crowded, and I can get a good seat.

But I suppose the reason I want to watch it on the opening weekend, and give it support, can be described in one word.

Spite.

I’m going to see Captain Marvel because of spite. I’ve read the comments being made about it, despite the fact no ones seen it yet, and I’ve decided I am spiteful enough to make time and see it.

If I really enjoy it, I may even be spiteful enough to leave a comment on rotten tomatoes!

tags: i need the merch but it's too expensive help
summary: Ppl really be out here saying Brie Larson is “racist and sexist” for not wanting popular media to be “overwhelmingly white and...
body:
Ppl really be out here saying Brie Larson is “racist and sexist” for not wanting popular media to be “overwhelmingly white and male” ie wanting media to be full of the voices and presence of POC and female fans and creators

I know it’ll be popular regardless but I can guarantee that going out to watch Captain Marvel and making it a hit will make actual sexists and racists mad and that already justifies price of entry 

But even if not that, I’m excited because early reviews point to a great villain, a great/mindblowing mystery element, and GOOSE THE CAT

So I’m pretty excited to see it
